title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8129.01 - City of Lockport
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8129.01 - City of Lockport

State Regulations
(a) Ohio

Street. The northbound and southbound roadways of Ohio Street between Bear

Ridge Road and Simonds Street; provided, however, that Ohio Street is
designated as an access highway for use by tandem trailer combinations only, and is not designated as an access highway for any other types of
vehicles. (b) Simonds Street. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Simonds Street between Ohio Street and

Crosby Avenue; provided, however, that Simonds Street is designated as an
access highway for use by tandem trailer combinations only, and is not
designated as an access highway for any other types of vehicles. (c) Park Avenue. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Park Avenue between Route 31 and Ohio Street. (d) Heath Street. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Heath Street between Park Avenue and Oakhurst

Street. (e) Oakhurst Street. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Oakhurst Street for a distance of 750+-
feet from Heath Street. (f) South

Niagara Street. The eastbound and westbound roadways of South Niagara Street
between Heath Street and Michigan Street. (g) Michigan Street. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Michigan Street between Park Avenue and South Niagara

Street. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8129.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
